descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]Sorry, [/b]English is not my native language, so enough support may be a little inpossible, but I think you will know what I say, coz my English is not too bad (and also not too good, haha) . 

[b]Many time[/b] some equipments like clothes and armours is not a full set (head, body, hands, foots|helmet, cuirass, Gauntlets, boots), so you can not obtain the full set bonus, and also lost the enchantment place. But when you want to go a mashup style, you find that you can't find some equipments to fit them. 
When this time, you need the invisible|immaterial Equipments, and you will get the bonus and the enchantment place.

[b]this mod[/b] contains a heavy armour set, a light armour set and a chothes set, it looks like you are naked when you equip these equipments, but people will not talk about that you are naked (I have already weared clothes, though you all guys can't see them,haha).


[b]About this mod:[/b]
-completely invisible|immaterial, but you will get the full set bonus and the enchantment place
-in theory, these equipments will support males and females, also support all of the body types
-support the weight slider
-the other stats is nearly the dragon equipments
-can be enchanted and tempered


[b]about the option: The headless rider[/b]
-this is a by-product of invisible|immaterial Equipments, contains the heavy|light|clothes helmet, when you 
equip these helmets, you will become a headless rider(see the last image).


[b]PERMISSION:[/b]

Credit me, and you can do everything you like with this mod, but you are NOT allowed to make money with my mod, I want to share to people, FOR FREE.[/size]
author: ttkgod
